This method allows to create a new person.

Request

  • The headers must include a valid authentication token.
  • The body canâ€™t be empty .
  • required unique email address, type string.
  • required password, type string.

Authentication: bearer TOKEN { firstName : 'emma', lastName : 'stone', email : 'roberts69@icloud.com', contactNumber : 7774444, bloodType : 'O', _id : '55379906501f1db540f0e119' }

Response

If succeeds, returns the created person.

Status: 201 Created { firstName : 'emma', lastName : 'stone', email : 'roberts69@icloud.com', contactNumber : 7774444, bloodType : 'O', _id : '55379906501f1db540f0e119' }

For errors responses, see the response status codes documentation.
